Text: If youre a big fan- BUY THEM!
If you are Mike Portnoy, Fuck you!!

I would never pay for this shit Portnoy, mostly 'cause I don't have the money for extra shit. If I develop an extreme obsession for drumming, which would be after watching countless downloaded videos on the matter, I might buy my favorite ones. Most of the videos are trash anyway, in my opinion.
